title: Elegant Emerald and Pearl Nakshi Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: and lustrous South Sea Pearls. This piece boasts the signature Hyderabadi Polish for an unparalleled shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases intricate Nakshi work, a traditional South Indian technique. The floral design is enhanced by emerald accents and cascading pearls, creating a graceful and opulent look. The locket features a similar floral design to complement the necklace. The setting is designed to maximize the brilliance of the CZ stones, giving the impression of diamonds.
colors: Primarily gold with a dazzling white from the CZ stones
punctuated by the vibrant green of the Emeralds and soft
iridescent white of the Pearls. A color palette rich in tradition and elegance.
occasions: Perfect for traditional Telugu ceremonies like Muhurtham
and Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for grand celebrations
and weddings where you want to make a lasting impression.
description: This Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom. Its traditional Nakshi design carries cultural significance, while the modern setting and lustrous pearls offer contemporary appeal. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and the highest quality materials, it's a durable and valuable investment.
